Sir '''Gerard Manface''' was a member of the [[Notion Club]].

== History ==
Sir Gerard Manface was educated at All Souls and became a lawyer by occupation. His main hobby was mountaineering and he was well traveled. He had many children, for whom he wrote many unpublished books and tales. He was a special friend of [[Philip Frankley]], though he was not resident in [[Oxford]] and seldom appeared at the [[Notion Club]].<ref>{{SD|2b}}</ref>
